member.name: F:V8.Net.Loader.AlternateRootSubPath
member.summary:
The sub-folder that is the root for the dependent libraries (x86 and x64). This is set to "V8.NET" by default.
This setting allows copying the V8.NET libraries to a project, and having the assemblies "Copy if never" automatically. Typically the path is relative, but an absolute root path can also be given.

member.name: P:V8.Net.Loader.ValidPaths
